game_description: 99 Racers, Limitless Race Tracks, Endless Game Grab steering wheel with your hands ! Race against 98 AI Controlled Racers in auto generated race tracks. AI Map generator creates roads up to 28 Miles (45 Km) You will never need to play same race track twice! Racing sanbox does not have any virtual walls and restrictions. You can roam freely to anywhere.
